definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Germanic origin, commonly used in English-speaking countries. It is derived from the Old High German name 'Albwin', meaning 'noble friend'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自日耳曼语的男性名字，常见于英语国家，由古高地德语名字 'Albwin' 演变而来，意为‘高贵的朋友’。
definitions.example_en: Alvin is the lead singer of the fictional band Alvin and the Chipmunks.
definitions.example_cn: 阿尔文是虚构乐队《小熊维尼与花栗鼠》的主唱。
